name: Hellkeeper - Demo
description:
Awaken... Lilit... The Hellkeeper is Needed.

In Hellkeeper you play as the Guardian of Hell itself -- awakening once every century as the planets align, when the souls of the damned become strong enough to attempt to overthrow the balance of good and evil.  As the Hellkeeper, it is your duty to keep these souls in check.

A platformer inspired by Castlevania 4 and Mario brothers, Hellkeeper features art and music by the wonderful Azakaela and at the time of this writing contains 3 action packed levels to traverse.
